frame.label: Screen saver

radio-group.name: ROX/ManageScreensaver
radio-group.radio: Select this option if you want to defer screen-saving to another application, such as XScreensaver, or if you want to use the system defaults.
If this option is selected ROX-Session sets the X.org timeouts for X server management of the screen blanker, using the options below.

Set this option to make ROX-Session collaborate with gnome-screensaver 2.26 or newer. ROX-Session will start gnome-screensaver for you, so do not try to start it by any other means, but you should start gnome-power-manager separately eg using XDGStart.

frame.numentry: The screen will blank without power saving (instant recovery) after this many minutes; 0 to disable blanking.
frame.toggle: Whether to put the monitor(s) into power saving modes using DPMS after specified delays.
frame.numentry: The screen will enter a low level of power saving (minimal power saving, quick recovery) after this many minutes.
The screen will enter a medium level of power saving after this many minutes.
The screen will enter a high level of power saving (maximum power saving, slower recovery) after this many minutes.
